reviews.review:
I want to love this game. 
I watched gameplay streams and thoroughly enjoyed its mechanics. Eventually, I decided to part with me dollars to buy the game. 

Unfortunately, there are so little asia/oceania players (or killers) that it became a lobby simulator 2016 again. And when I was able get to into a game, it is so laggy that I could not enjoy the game at all. 

I really do hope the developers can have dedicated servers so that players from all over the world can enjoy this game with such a huge potential.

Until then, refunded.

I really enjoy this game, it has offered many hours for me to enjoy with my friends or even alone. While sure the game might not be perfect with some bugs here and there, I think any reasonable person can look past them and still enjoy the game. With such amazing and hard working Devs, change is always something to look forwards too. I reccomend the game, just keep at it, get some nice perks, play with friends, and I'm sure you will love it too~! 

Happy Hunting or Surviving!

match making for lower ranks is better and they patched out some of the bugs. as long as they listen to their community and balance the game as needed it is a fun game

Плюсы
+динамичная игра, с множеством ловушек и секретов.
+хороший пик персонажей.
+куча перков и разных итемов.
+мультиплеер с друзьями как за выживших так и с маньяком.
+графика.
+система рангов(подобная у фифы с дивизионами).
+достаточно быстрый поиск соперников .
и так минусы:
-баги(т.к. игра новая думаю можно простить зависание в текстурах и тп).
- кемперство убийцы.
- читеры (как и в любой другой игре куча читеров, но создатели клянутся богом что их не будет).
- абузеры (многие увеличивают свои очки крови путем взаимоподдержки с маньяком).
В полне  играбельно (имхо) .
9 пробелов из 10.

This is definitely one of the most fun games that I've bought on Steam, I have zero regrets about buying it. But buying it comes at the extra price of the well being of your index finger. You constantly have to be clicking to join a game and not get a "Failed to join Game" error message or a painfully laggy host. It's a fun game, but getting into a lobby is more of a challenge then surviving or finding a survivor to kill when actually in game. In its current form it has many imperfections which will hopefully be corrected soon.
muy buen juego lo unico que le resta puntos es el lag una de 3 partidas sale con lag cosa que espero que arreglen
Игра хорошая и все!

Queue system really needs some updates, you have to constantly ready up every few seconds and at alot of times it can be impossible to find a game if your trying to que up with friends and a lack of penalties for people leaving a lobby or game means alot of times after you've finally found a game you'll just be kicked and have to repeat the queing process again. Although once you do manage to get into a game its really enjoyable, though probably best played with some friends rather than by yourself to make the queing process a bit more beareable.

Not recommended right now. so many bugs and glitches and its a pain in the ass just to get connected to a game. I quit before I even get into a match.

I have absolutely been LOVING this game! It's been a blast. I enjoy playing as the survivor the most. The game is always challenging and intense. It always feels fresh everytime I play. And the suspense is never ending. I highly recommend it to any slasher flick horror fan looking to get an adrenalin fix. The gameplay is really solid as well. Graphics are great in my opinion. The controls are comfortable and easy to get the hang of if you are familiar with third and first person. I honestly can't say I have any cons other than it needing more game modes, however I'm sure those will come along eventually. :) The creators of the game seem to be on top of the updates and staying in touch with their players. So for me I give this game a PERFECT 10! I LOVE IT! And to top it off, The price is a STEAL <3 Hats off to the creators! Thank you for this masterpiece!! :D
-Desmond

[h1]First of all: DON'T BUY THIS GAME! NOOOO GOD! NO GOD PLEASE NO! NO! NO! NOOOOOOOOOOOO!!![/h1]

And here’s why:

"4v1 cooperative competitive horror game". Sounds great, right? It is. I like game mechanics, I like to play hide and seek with killer, trying to outwit him. But I don’t recommend it. Don't even play the game, if you have free copy. It's just horrible.

Main reason of this negative review - developers. Maybe they are lazy, maybe they are students, or maybe they are just a bunch of monkeys, which press the buttons with no porpoise. Two month passed since release and it’s still has a bugs, that it had at launch: UI bugs, such as inverted state of buttons, or displaying button promts when it’s shouldn’t be displayed; unhandled connection errors – if you connecting to friend lobby through invite, but friend has left the lobby, you will be loading forever; objects state bugs – sometimes you cannot interact with another player (even if you are killer) when you should, or your character doesn’t hold items in a proper way, so you cannot use them (and, thanks god, lose); matchmaking… “Failed to join a game”, “No games found”, *returns to main menu*… You cannot just press ready and wait for game. Matchmaking WILL crash and you must press again, and again, and again… If you get lucky you find game with couple of crashes. But you don’t. You need to use offerings to developers to boost your chances. But seriously, they said that matchmaking system is too fragile to make changes to it. Nuff said.

I like game content, but I don't like technical execution of this content. Game must be playable.

I still play game with my friends, because there are no analogues, no asymmetrical cooperative horror games. There are no more reasons to play this game. So don’t buy it, even with 99% discount. Developers didn’t deserve your money. Save your time, money and nerves.

UPD: Oh, I'm sorry, my mistake - it's THREE months.
trés bon jeu
игра хорошая но аптимизации не хватает

I love Dead by Daylight.

This game has its bugs here and there but the dev team, I see a dedication close to that of Warframe's team. A group that love their game and are constantly working on it. They  listen to their audience and use hard numbers to try and balance things just right.

The power trip of beating people to death and the feeling of escaping unscathed on either side of the fence are just great experiences. For such a cheap price it provides a lot of fun.

If you enjoy playing games by yourself, or with a full group of friends, then you'll like this game. Plan on playing with only a couple friends? Don't even bother. You spend 5 seconds looking for a match and have to keep refreshing the search every 5 seconds when in a group. Then, you end up in a match full of lag where no one can move until someone DSs. Devs cant seem to figure out how to fix the networking issues. I mean, whos idea was it to only spend 5 seconds to look for a match?

生存者、殺人鬼のどちらにしてもストレスをためないでプレイするのは不可能です。
殺人鬼役はVCPTで結託する生存者4人を1人で相手にしなくてはいけません。
プレイしないのがこのゲームとの付き合い方としては最良の方法です。
nice game!

This is one of the best games I have ever played. 

I have been playing this game since beta, I played on release and I keep coming back to play more. As the game matures, it is comstantly getting better. The developers have learned from their mistakes and have put in a great deal of time and effort into making the game better with great success and because of this I will play the game for many more years to come. 

As I write this, the game has never been stronger, a feat not many games can say 18 months after release. 

Average player base August 2016: 15832.73 (old high)
Average player base last 30 days: 15853.09  (mid way through Nov 2017)

The numbers speak for themselves. This game is fun.
It never gets old as long as you find something to work for, it maybe leveling up or getting an item but there is always something to do.
GOOD

Buon gioco, anzi buonissimo. L'unico problema è che le partite si trovano solo dopo tanti tentativi e con l'ultimo aggiornamento c'è un bug di Steam che, dopo aver chiuso il gioco, lo ritiene ancora "in esecuzione", il che dà fastidio per alcune azioni.

Долго присматривался к игре, смотрел трансляции, следил за новостями и обновлениями. В какой-то момент просто взял и купил... и не пожалел. Играется легко, хотя первые несколько часов дались мне сложно - понять как убегать, путать следы, прятаться, слушать и наблюдать. "Картинка" прекрасна (другого просто нельзя было ожидать от Unreal Engine (движок) + прямые руки), вкупе с восхитительной передачей мрачной атмосферы получился ШШшшшшшедевр - все сделано добротно: персонажы, карты, звуковое сопровождение, геймплей. Люблю игры, когда они радуют не только глаз и уши, но и дергают за струны души. Игра хорошо держит в напряжении, даже если играешь за маньяка. DbD оставляет хорошее мнение о себе. Посмотрим как быстро она начнет надоедать...
Бля, после обновы 2.0 упал ФПС. Было 30-33, стало 17-20. Пришлось менять разрешение экрана, и разрешение в игре что бы вернуть 30...

Jugar como superviviente te mantiene siempre en tensión. Es un juego muy original, y los sonidos lo hacen aún más inquietante. Lo único malo que se puede sacar del juego, es que el matchmaking esta buggeado y no te deja buscar a veces ni jugando tú solo (imagina jugando un grupo de 4).

Dead by Daylight war über die letzten Wochen hinweg wohl das Spiel, welches mir am meisten Spaß bereitet hat. Leider ist das Spiel bei mir momentan unspielbar geworden aufgrund eines sogenannten Integritätsverstoßes verbunden mit EAC. Das ist für mich unerklärbar, da ich keine Cheats benutze oder sonstige unfaire Mittel. Sollte ich jetzt gebannt sein ist es schade um das Geld und meines Erachtens völlig zu Unrecht.

-Ques mostly broken

Salted eggs are normally brined duck eggs. Chinese people use them to make moon cakes（月餅）, glutinous rice dumplings (粽子) and many other dishes. Some families I know, like to steam salted eggs that go with congee for breakfast.

In my good old days, salted duck eggs are often sold covered in a thick layer of salted charcoal paste. Nowadays, the producers might know how to do marketing and give the humble salted eggs a nicer presentation. The salted duck eggs I come across here recently almost have the salted paste removed, wrapped in plastic, or vacuum packed. The best salted eggs should have a briny aroma, translucent egg white, with the yolk bright orange-red in colour. The yolk that releases oil after being cooked is considered as a high quality product.

Sadly, here in Australia, it’s quite hard to find fresh duck eggs, yet it’s much easier to get some cooked ones. Weird, isn’t it? If any fresh duck eggs put on rack for sale in any Asian grocery stores, they would be gone very quickly.

As I have been missing and craving this homey food very much, I brined a dozen and then cooked several traditional Chinese dishes with the salted eggs. Would you like to know what dishes I cooked? I'll post them in a series later on.


I was glad to hear that Penny of Addictive and Consuming and Trix of Tasty Trix would host an International Egg Incident Party. Lucky enough I can manage myself to participate this time. Here in this post, I share an easy way to make salted eggs at home. This time I used chicken eggs. If you can find fresh duck eggs, that’s even better. But I found the end result of using chicken eggs was very satisfied. This recipe was tested for many times. Not long before, I shared this recipe with my Chinese readers, all salted egg lovers were fascinated and many of them tried it on the next day they read my recipe with satisfied outcomes. Here’s a picture of my fan's salted egg. She shared her joy with me when she successfully made some delicious salted eggs.

Homemade Salted Eggs 

Ingredients:
12 duck eggs (or chicken eggs)
1 cup sea salt (or rock salt)
4 cups water
1 tbsp Shaoxing wine
1 star anise
2 tsp Sichuan peppercorns


Method:
Rinse the eggs and drain well. Set aside.
Put water and salt in a saucepan. Add star anise and Szechwan peppercorns. Bring it to a boil. Once the salt completely dissolves, turn off the heat. Let cool completely.
Pour in the wine and stir well.
Use a clean glass container, carefully arrange the eggs in the container. (Note: check every egg to make sure there are no cracks on it.) Pour salted water into the container and cover the eggs. You’ll notice some eggs above would float to the surface, so place something, like a little sauce plate on top of the eggs. The basic idea is to get all eggs submerse completely in the brine. Tightly cover the container and place at room temperature. The brining process normally takes 30 to 40 days. Label the start and finish dates on the container to remind yourself. (I used google calendar to set an email alert to myself.) After 30 days, take one egg out to cook and see if its taste is salty enough. If not, let the rest to brine for a few days more. If you’re satisfied, drain all eggs out and wipe dry. Keep them in an egg carton and place in fridge. The salted eggs can be kept for a few weeks in fridge.


Notes:
Before placing the eggs in the container, do make sure all the eggs are not broken or have any cracks.
If you don’t have star anise and Sichuan peppercorns, you can replace with any tea leaves you like when cooking the salted water. The egg shells would look darker, infused by the fragrance of the tea you used.
The egg yolks would turn orange-red beautifully because of the effect of adding Shaoxing wine.

Although I have low hours on this game, I also have about 15 hours on the beta version, and I must say that very little has changed from the beta. Is the game still fun? Yes, it is very fun, and it's one of the few games where my heart starts to really beat when I'm getting chased. There are quite a few glaring problems though. For one it doesn't seem they have improved multiplayer whatsoever. I still have to click join a lobby about 5 to 10 times to actually join a lobby(it was even worse in the beta). There is also very little change in my opinion from the beta. They just added a new characters and maps and that was it. Another problem with the game is with some of the maps. There are some places on certain maps where a survivor can just run in circles and the killer cannot catch them because they vault a wall anytime you get close. Most of the map isnt like this but some places it is just impossible to catch someone. Another problem I have is how fast a person can be removed from a hook. If you turn your back for two seconds that victim is gone like the wind. My final problem with the game has to be the heart beat to tell you where a victim is. Time and Time again killers have ran right towards my position, while I get this is to balance the game, it honestly should just be an indicator to give a general direction, and ontop of that a good killer shouldn't have many problems finding survivors, because as the number of repairable generators dwindles a killer is able to go between all of them and check to see which ones are being repaired. Anyways I still believe this game is fun for many hours, and it is well worth the money

Wish I could be here writing a great review for this potentailly fantastic game....instead I'm expressing my dissapointment.   I want to play as a killer, but the framerate is around 15fps on the lowest settings with the lowest resolution.   (I play doom on 1080p Ultra settings at 100+ fps btw).   So instead I try to play as the survivor.  Cannot join a game.   For at least a half hour.   This game's optimization and matchmaking have progressively gotten WORSE since the release.   I hope the devs realize they are on a timeline.  If they don't fix this soon, we will all be purchasing the new Friday the 13th game when it drops and genuinely hoping that this game and your company fall of the map.   Thumbs down.  Regrettably.  Could be my favorite game.
